Department of Pharmacology, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records
titlestmt.author: compiled by Staff of Manuscripts and Archives

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:13

did.unittitle: Department of Pharmacology, School of Medicine, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of correspondence, applications, recommendations, and general subject files documenting the activities and operations of the Department of Pharmacology at the Yale School of Medicine.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 27-E (YRG 27-E), Records of departments, offices, programs, and projects of the Yale School of Medicine

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Department of Pharmacology, School of Medicine, Yale University, Records (RU 784). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of correspondence, applications, recommendations, and general subject files documenting the activities and operations of the Department of Pharmacology at the Yale School of Medicine
